Title: Relates to requiring certain notices to be provided when selling a helicopter
Summary: Requires a notice to be provided when selling a helicopter which contains all incidents reported within the past ten years by the national transportation safety bureau or the federal aviation administration involving the make and model, or a substantially similar make and model, of such helicopter.
LawCode: Add ยง243-a, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring certain notices to be provided when selling a helicopter
